meanings.en: These words are used with the preposition "on"

exampleSentence: The new policy had a significant effect ON the economy. / Social media has a huge influence ON teenagers. / Climate change will have a major impact ON future generations.

meanings.en: These words are used with "into" for transformation meaning

exampleSentence: Water can turn INTO ice at low temperatures. / The company transformed INTO a global brand. / They converted the old factory INTO a modern museum.

word: Overcome / Tackle / Handle / Cope with / Deal with

meanings.en: All mean "to manage/handle a difficult situation" (synonyms)

exampleSentence: She overcame her fear of public speaking. / We need to tackle this problem immediately. / He learned to cope with stress through meditation.

word: Lead to / Cause / Result in / Bring about / Give rise to

meanings.tr: Hepsi "sebep olmak, yol açmak" anlamına gelir (eş anlamlı)
meanings.en: All mean "to cause something to happen" (synonyms)

exampleSentence: Smoking can lead to serious health problems. / The accident resulted in several injuries. / His speech gave rise to a heated debate.

word: Depend on / Rely on / Count on / Bank on / Rest on

meanings.tr: Hepsi "birine/bir şeye güvenmek veya bağlı olmak" anlamına gelir
meanings.en: All mean "to trust or be contingent upon" (synonyms)

exampleSentence: Success depends on hard work and dedication. / You can always rely on your true friends. / I'm counting on you to finish this project.

word: Prevent / Stop / Hinder / Prohibit / Ban / Restrict + FROM

meanings.en: These words use "from" to express prevention or prohibition

exampleSentence: The law prevents companies FROM polluting rivers. / Security guards stopped him FROM entering the building. / Parents prohibited their children FROM using social media.

word: Increase / Rise / Growth / Surge + IN & Decrease / Fall / Decline + IN

meanings.tr: Artış veya azalışı ifade ederken "in" edatı kullanılır
meanings.en: Use "in" preposition when expressing increase or decrease

exampleSentence: There has been a significant increase IN unemployment. / We observed a sharp rise IN prices last month. / The decline IN sales worried the management.

word: Participate in / Take part in / Join / Engage in / Be involved in

meanings.tr: Hepsi "katılmak, dahil olmak" anlamına gelir (eş anlamlı)
meanings.en: All mean "to take part in an activity" (synonyms)

exampleSentence: Students are encouraged to participate in extracurricular activities. / She decided to take part in the competition. / Many volunteers are involved in the charity work.

word: Postpone / Put off / Delay / Suspend & Cancel / Call off
exampleSentence: The meeting was postponed until next week. / We had to put off our vacation due to work. / The concert was called off because of the storm.

meanings.en: These words use "from" to express discouragement

exampleSentence: High prices deter customers FROM buying. / Parents tried to discourage him FROM dropping out. / Nothing could dissuade her FROM pursuing her dream.

meanings.tr: Bu kelimeler "to" ile kullanılır (adamak, tahsis etmek)
meanings.en: These words use "to" for dedication or allocation

exampleSentence: She devoted her life TO helping others. / The government allocated more funds TO education. / He committed himself TO finishing the project.

word: Stem from / Result from / Derive from / Originate from

meanings.en: All mean "to come from, to originate" (synonyms)

exampleSentence: His problems stem from poor financial decisions. / The word derives from ancient Greek. / This tradition originates from medieval times.

meanings.en: These words use "with" for providing or equipping

exampleSentence: The company provides employees WITH health insurance. / The school supplied students WITH new textbooks. / The gym is equipped WITH modern facilities.

word: Consist of / Comprise / Be composed of / Be made up of / Contain

meanings.tr: Hepsi "-den oluşmak, içermek" anlamına gelir (eş anlamlı)
meanings.en: All mean "to be formed of, to include" (synonyms)

exampleSentence: The team consists of five members. / Water is composed of hydrogen and oxygen. / The book comprises ten chapters.

meanings.en: All mean "to give special importance to" (synonyms)

exampleSentence: The teacher emphasized the importance of practice. / I want to stress that safety comes first. / The report highlights the main findings.
